[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Each dealership has unique goals they want to reach, and yet many use the same generic fixed ops marketing strategies from whatever is given out of the box from website providers or the OEM.

If you want to stand out in the industry, it’s important to partner with vendors that understand what your specific goals are and do everything they can to help you succeed. Enter Fixed Ops Digital’s Performance Team…[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][team_member image_url=”7578″ team_memeber_style=”meta_overlaid” image_loading=”default” name=”Erika Watts”][/team_member][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][team_member image_url=”7823″ team_memeber_style=”meta_overlaid” image_loading=”default” name=”Jaime Zazove”][/team_member][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]We built our performance team with people who care. Each team member is dedicated to their dealer clients and will work hard to check that everyone’s on the same page. Our incredible team will ensure that your goals are met by forming relationships with you and creating solutions that work for everyone. Here are a few things our performance team had to say about working with clients:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][testimonial_slider style=”minimal” star_rating_color=”accent-color”][testimonial star_rating=”none” title=”Testimonial” id=”1629324156190-10″ tab_id=”1629324156191-10″ name=”Alanna Chan” subtitle=”SVP of Client Performance” quote=”My dealers are my friends, we talk about things we do in our personal life besides business. It’s great just seeing all these relationships being built and even when service managers move to different dealerships, they actually bring us with them!”][testimonial star_rating=”none” title=”Testimonial” id=”1629324156241-8″ tab_id=”1629324156242-3″ name=”Erika Watts” subtitle=”Director of Client Performance” quote=”I really love building relationships with my customers – not just about their reporting and their data but building that personal relationship.”][testimonial star_rating=”none” title=”Testimonial” id=”1629324156267-2″ tab_id=”1629324156268-10″ name=”Jaime Zazove” subtitle=”VP of Client Performance” quote=”I love what I do, I love working with the clients. I love helping them! It’s really fun when you get really good clients and the success you see from them.”][testimonial star_rating=”none” title=”Testimonial” id=”1629324156309-6″ tab_id=”1629324156310-4″ name=”Jen Paine” subtitle=”SVP of Analytics & Performance” quote=”I have my own clients whom I LOVE! I get to deal with them on a monthly basis, weekly basis in some instances, so that is phenomenal. I love the human interaction with the clients as well.”][/testimonial_slider][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Let us help you take your fixed ops digital marketing to the next level! Contact us for a demo and start working with our performance team today.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”center” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”small” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Schedule a Demo” url=”https://www.fixedopsdigital.com/demo/”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
